name: Spiced Beet Puree With Walnut Oil
recipeIngredient: 6 medium-sized beets (about 2 pounds), with 1-inch of stem attached

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. On a large double sheet of aluminum foil, place the beets with the garlic, bay leaves, cloves and allspice. Wrap up into a package and roast until beets are tender, about 2 hours.
Open the package, cut the stems off the beets and peel. Place the beets in a food processor and process until smooth. Stir in the walnut oil and the salt. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
